entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -17.7°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
